gap_table.title: Content Gap Analysis Table
gap_table.description: Comprehensive view of all identified content gaps with impact scores, difficulty levels, and gap types. Enables filtering and prioritization of content opportunities.

topic_heatmap.title: Topic Coverage Heatmap
topic_heatmap.description: Comparative analysis of topic coverage between your organization and competitors. Darker cells indicate higher coverage intensity. Identifies topic gaps and opportunities at a glance.

impact_chart.title: Content Opportunity Matrix: Impact vs. Difficulty
impact_chart.description: Strategic prioritization view showing content opportunities plotted by business impact and creation difficulty. Quadrants identify quick wins (high impact, low difficulty), strategic investments (high impact, high difficulty), and low priorities.

model_metrics.title: ML Model Performance Metrics
model_metrics.description: Comprehensive evaluation metrics for the content gap classification model. Displays precision, recall, F1 scores, and confusion matrix to validate model accuracy meets â‰¥80% threshold.

timeline.title: 90-Day Content Publication Roadmap
timeline.description: Strategic publication schedule showing prioritized content recommendations over the next 90 days. Color-coded by gap type with impact indicators for resource planning and stakeholder alignment.
